contentencoded: For-profit universities have come under fire in recent years because of questionable practices at some institutions. But today, schools like the University of Phoenix, DeVry and others are working hard to transform their images. Correspondent Emily Hanford interviewed Kaplan University’s Peter Smith for an upcoming documentary that tracks the rise of the for-profit higher education industry.
